newsitem.title: JAPAN: S&P gives AA/AAr forex rating to NSW dual samurais.
newsitem.headline: S&P gives AA/AAr forex rating to NSW dual samurais.

text.p: Standard & Poor's (S&P) said on Monday it had assigned an "AA" foreign currency rating to New South Wales Treasury Corp's yen/Australian dollar samurai bond issue worth 10 billion yen, which matures on October 25, 1999.
S&P said it had assigned an "AAr" foreign currency rating to NSW Treasury Corp's 15 billion yen dual-currency bonds maturing on October 25, 1999.
The ratings on both bonds are constrained by the "AA" foreign currency sovereign rating on Australia, S&P said.
It added that the foreign currency rating outlook was positive.
